beer.beer_description:
Complex sake like flavors with malt sweet notes. Hints of strawberries in the nose and palate. An intriguing mix of sake, malt , and bitter notes in the finish.

Malts: Larger
Hops: Chinook
Adjuncts: Red Rice, Flaked Barley
Color: Smoky Pink

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 5 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 2!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 30 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 10 years on Untappd!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 235 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 48!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 70 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 15!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 150 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 31!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 35 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 115 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 24!
